description: The area within a sample that is represented by non-tumor tissue.

A three dimensional mass comprised of a cultured cell or tissue sample that resembles an in vivo tissue or organ. Organoids are grown in vitro from a combination of cells or tissue fragments cultured in medium containing a variety of biochemical factors.
A tumor sample, or entire tumor that is removed for microscopic examination.

A three dimensional mass comprised of a cultured tumor cell or tumor sample that resembles an in vivo tumor. Tumoroid are grown in vitro from a combination of cells or tissue fragments cultured in medium containing a variety of biochemical factors.
